decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( 6056P011, P100, P010, P200, P201, P103 received 06/11/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for A1 (retail) and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class A of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 4 - No delivery or servicing vehicle servicing the use herby approved shall exceed 8.1m in length.

Condition : 5 - Prior to commencement of development, an updated delivery and servicing plan shall be submitted to, and approved by, the Local Planning Authority. This shall include confirmation that no deliveries shall take place between 8am and 6pm and details of the delivery and servicing vehicles that will be visiting the site. The use shall be carried out in accordance with these details.
Condition : 6 - The Workplace Travel Plan, as submitted as part of the proposals shall be adhered to throughout the lifetime of this development.
Condition : 7 - The use hereby permitted for A1(retail) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times 7am -11pm
description: Change of use to retail (A1) and installation of a new entrance and external plant area
